mapper.sql: SUBJ_SCTN_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE, SUBJ_SCTN_NUM, SUBJ_SCTN_CODE, SUBJ_SCTN_INFO, SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN
mapper.select: select SUBJ_SCTN_ID, sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID, SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE, SUBJ_SCTN_NUM, SUBJ_SCTN_CODE, SUBJ_SCTN_INFO, SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN ,tch.tch_name ,tch.TCH_ID from subj_section sctn left join subj_unit su on sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = su.SUBJ_UNIT_ID left join teacher tch on su.TCH_ID = tch.TCH_ID where tch.TCH_ID = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by su.SUBJ_UNIT_NUM ,SUBJ_SCTN_NUM

select SUBJ_SCTN_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE, SUBJ_SCTN_NUM, SUBJ_SCTN_CODE, SUBJ_SCTN_INFO, SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN from subj_section where SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into subj_section (SUBJ_SCTN_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE, SUBJ_SCTN_NUM, SUBJ_SCTN_CODE, SUBJ_SCTN_INFO, SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL, SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN) values (#{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subjSctnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnVideoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnPicText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjSctnVideoLen,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into subj_section
SUBJ_SCTN_ID,
SUBJ_UNIT_ID,
SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE,
SUBJ_SCTN_NUM,
SUBJ_SCTN_CODE,
SUBJ_SCTN_INFO,
SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL,
SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL,
SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT,
SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN,
#{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update subj_section
SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE = #{subjSctnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_NUM = #{subjSctnNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUBJ_SCTN_CODE = #{subjSctnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_INFO = #{subjSctnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL = #{subjSctnLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL = #{subjSctnVideoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT = #{subjSctnPicText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN = #{subjSctnVideoLen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where SUBJ_SCTN_ID = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update subj_section set SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_TITLE = #{subjSctnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_NUM = #{subjSctnNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUBJ_SCTN_CODE = #{subjSctnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_INFO = #{subjSctnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_LOGO_URL = #{subjSctnLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_URL = #{subjSctnVideoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_PIC_TEXT = #{subjSctnPicText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_SCTN_VIDEO_LEN = #{subjSctnVideoLen,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SUBJ_SCTN_ID = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
